column4: Welcome, you are now talking to an AI doctor. As I am part of a scientific experiment, I would appreciate it if you could take the time to answer a super short questionnaire at the end of the interview. Tap Speak to ask your question and then tap Send to submit it to me.
hello i have a dysmenorrhea right now and what will i do

Hello. Dysmenorrhea is a common condition characterized by cramping and pain during menstrual periods. To treat it, you can try over-the-counter pain relievers such as ibuprofen or naproxen sodium. Additionally, lifestyle modifications such as exercising, dietary changes, and relaxation techniques can be beneficial. If the symptoms don't improve or keep recurring, please consult your doctor for further investigation.
